commits.message:
[GOC-3194] Hide voucher Input on Plans and update regex to accept MR-OTPX pattern (#59114)

* feat(GOC-3194): Add OTP product detection utilities

- Created isOTPProduct utility function to check if SKU starts with MR-OTP
- Created useHasOTPInCart hook to detect OTP products in cart
- Added comprehensive unit tests for both utilities
- Function can be imported independently for reuse in other tickets

[AI_Code]

* Update isOTPProduct.ts

* Update useHasOTPInCart.ts

* feat(GOC-3194): hide voucher input on plans page when OTP in cart

- Add useHasOTPInCart hook integration to PlansPreferencesPage
- Conditionally render PromotionCodeContainer based on OTP presence
- Add unit tests for OTP voucher input control
- Suppress max-lines ESLint rule for PlansPreferencesPage

[AI_Code]

* Remove OTP checks from PlansPreferencesPage component

- Remove useHasOTPInCart import and usage
- Always show PromotionCodeContainer regardless of cart contents
- Remove OTP-related tests and mocks
- Simplify component logic by removing conditional OTP checks

[AI_Code]

* Update OTP product detection logic with correct regex pattern

- Replace array-based OTP detection with regex pattern
- Update regex to match actual OTP SKUs: MR-OTP[1|2]-(6|12|18)-1-0
- Add comprehensive tests for all valid OTP product SKUs
- Add negative tests for invalid patterns and edge cases
- All 21 tests passing with accurate OTP detection

[AI_Code]

* Update index.js

* adjust tests

* minor adjustment

---------

Co-authored-by: Himash Tehan <himash.tehan@hellofresh.com>
commits.author: Madeeha Hasan

[TPT-2236] Fix PrivateSymbol.getProxyInternalField error in cart … (#59087)

* fix(TPT-2236): Fix PrivateSymbol.getProxyInternalField error in cart reducer

- Add missing cartStatus initialization checks in GET_CART_PENDING, CART_DETAILS_PENDING, and CAlCULATE_AND_APPLY_VOUCHER_PENDING cases
- Prevents ReferenceError when cartStatus is undefined during Redux Persist rehydration
- Ensures consistent defensive programming pattern across all cart status updates
- Fixes Sentry issue WEB-9XR4 affecting pet food checkout flow

* update unit tests
